detailed_instructions: You can open PTF files with Avid Pro Tools (version 7 or later) in Windows and macOS. For example, to open a PTF file, select File â†’ Open .
PTF files are not backward compatible with previous versions of Pro Tools, meaning version 6 or earlier of the software does not support PTF files.
